```{r datasauRus}
library(tidyverse) 
library(datasauRus)

?datasaurus_dozen

datasaurus_dozen%>%count(dataset)%>%print(13)

dino_data = datasaurus_dozen %>%
  filter(dataset == "dino")
ggplot(data = dino_data, mapping = aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
dino_data %>%
  summarize(r = cor(x, y))

dino_data = datasaurus_dozen %>%
  filter(dataset == "star")
ggplot(data = dino_data, mapping = aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
dino_data %>%
  summarize(r = cor(x, y))

dino_data = datasaurus_dozen %>%
  filter(dataset == "circle")
ggplot(data = dino_data, mapping = aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
dino_data %>%
  summarize(r = cor(x, y))
```
